reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: NGO Support / Youth empowerment project in Senegal

description.narrative: Youth unemployment rate in Senegal is about 30%, higher than the continent average of 21%. About 53% of Senegalese job seekers have little education. Youth (ages 16-35) represent 56% of total job-seekers. Young people lack the opportunity to gain formal wo rk experience, while a lack of general and job-related skills also puts them at a disadvantage. This project is designed to improve the employability of disadvantaged youth, ages 16 to 35, by providing demand-driven training in information and communicatio ns technology (ICT), life skills, entrepreneurship, and employment services. The program has run from 2007- 2009 with funding from Microsoft, implemented by Synapse Network Center, with the support of IYF. This proposal is based on the continuation of the successful program. Youth will receive training as well as placement or business development services, mentoring and coaching.
